# Kimi For Coding

Use `kimi-for-coding/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "kimi-for-coding-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "kimi-for-coding/kimi-k2-thinking",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `KIMI_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/anthropic`

## Default base URL

`https://api.kimi.com/coding/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `KIMI_FOR_CODING_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://www.kimi.com/coding/docs/en/third-party-agents.html
